page.title: 06COMMUNITY CENTRE - OPINIONS.
page.content:
We sent out{questionnaires}to 180 parents asking for their opinions of the Community Centre. We had 44 replies.
Going more than once a week - 12 About once a week - 7 About once a month - 5 Less than once a month - 5 Not going at all - 15
The people who used it thought it was good and had a friendly atmosphere. Two suggested there should be more for younger people. Those not going said:
Too busy to use it - 6 Good idea for those using it - 3 Too uncomfortable - 1 Nothing to interest them - 2 No opinion - 3
